title: Unified Database Management Dashboard
meta: Manage and monitor your Databases on Kubernetes visually. KubeDB UI Dashboard lets you deploy, configure, and observe databases with just a few clicks — no CLI required.

innerContent.title: Visual Database Deployment
innerContent.description: Create, configure, and deploy databases directly from an intuitive interface. Select your database engine, version, and resources — and KubeDB UI automatically generates the manifests and provisions your database in seconds.

innerContent.title: Real-time Status & Monitoring
innerContent.description: Stay informed with live status updates, health checks, and metrics. The dashboard provides a unified view of all database instances, showing pod health, storage usage, and resource consumption in real time.

innerContent.title: Easy Backup & Restore Management
innerContent.description: Schedule automated backups or perform instant restores through a visual workflow. KubeDB UI integrates with Stash to give you one-click access to backup policies, retention rules, and restore operations.

innerContent.title: Database Scaling & Upgrades
innerContent.description: Effortlessly scale CPU, memory, and storage or upgrade database versions with minimal downtime. The UI provides a safe and guided process for adjusting resources or performing rolling upgrades.

innerContent.title: Comprehensive Access Control
innerContent.description: Assign user roles and manage permissions directly from the dashboard. KubeDB UI integrates with Kubernetes RBAC, allowing fine-grained control over who can view, modify, or delete specific databases.

innerContent.title: Insights & Event Logs
innerContent.description: Troubleshoot faster with detailed event logs, operation history, and audit trails — all accessible within the UI. Track configuration changes, deployment history, and user actions in one place.
